summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of 33rd Avenue, from approximately 215 feet south of East Union Street to East Pine Street by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 10690 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
